#include "stdio.h"
#include "vector"
#include "queue"
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int n,i,d,x,tot=0;
	priority_queue<int> max;
	priority_queue<int, vector<int>, greater<int> > min;
	scanf("%d",&n);
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
		scanf("%d",&d);
		if(d==1)
		{
			scanf("%d",&x);
			tot++;
			if(tot>3 && x>min.top())
				min.push(x);
			else
				max.push(x);
			if(tot/3 > min.size())
			{
				min.push(max.top());
				max.pop();
			}
			if(tot/3 < min.size())
			{
				max.push(min.top());
				min.pop();			
			}
		}
		else
		{
			if(min.size()>0)
				printf("%d\n",min.top());
			else
				printf("No reviews yet\n");
		}
	}
	return 0;            
}
